ai-thig3.7:1.2_0: what use is seclusion in sensual pleasures?
ai-thig3.7:1.3_0: Enjoy the delights of sensual pleasure;
ai-thig3.7:2.1_0: Sensual pleasures are like an axe,
ai-thig3.7:2.2_0: the aggregates are their chopping block.
ai-thig3.7:2.4_0: is now no delight for me.
ai-thig3.7:3.2_0: and the mass of darkness is shattered.
